M

Main - Class in Model
This class is he main function for an inventory management system.
Main() - Constructor for class Model.Main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class Model.Main
Displays sample data Can be improved with a more integrated id allocation.
MainController - Class in Controller
Main controller that links all pages, and sends information about parts/products Future Enhancement: This controller redundantly uses code to map forms.
MainController() - Constructor for class Controller.MainController
 
Model - package Model
 
modifyParts(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainController
This method modifies parts in the part list, and sends the user back to the main form
ModifyPartsController - Class in Controller
This class modifies parts that have already been added to the inventory.
ModifyPartsController() - Constructor for class Controller.ModifyPartsController
 
ModifyProductController - Class in Controller
This class is the controller for the modify product screen Runtime Errors: Run time errors were caused when trying to cast data types incorrectly, and null pointer exception when trying to access methods from outside the file To get around these errors instances of Product and the observable list are declared in this file, to more simply access methods without null pointer exceptions or data type inconsistencies
ModifyProductController() - Constructor for class Controller.ModifyProductController
 
modifyProducts(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainController
This method modifies products in the product list, and sends the user back to the main form
